channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Yen Weakness Raises Prospect of Forex Intervention
item.description: USD/JPY pushed above 155 after the BOJ decided to hold rates and ING said the prospect of still-higher U.S. yields and a hesitant BOJ suggests Japanes...

item.title: ‘I’m nervous about the market’: We’re living off my pension as practice for retirement, but I’m afraid of a market correction
item.description: My wife is younger than I am, and longevity runs in both our families.

item.title: What the history of Fed pauses says about stocks and bonds after the market freak-out
item.description: Citigroup has published a timely piece looking at the history of Fed pauses during previous easing cycles, now that a January change looks remote

item.title: Stock Futures Edge Up After Fed-Fueled Selloff
item.description: Stock futures were clawing back a little ground after the Federal Reserve triggered a steep selloff by suggesting interest rates could stay higher nex...

item.title: The big connection between the yen and tech stocks has been severed
item.description: The yen was diving on Thursday, but that probably won’t help revive the so-called carry trade.

item.title: Buy the tech stock dip ahead of Trump rally, popular analyst says
item.description: Trump’s initiatives to boost America’s artificial intelligence (AI) sector will help the Magnificent Seven technology companies continue surging in 20...

item.title: Euro Credit Default Swaps Rise Following Fed Interest-Rate Decision
item.description: The cost of insuring euro-denominated credit against default using credit default swaps rose on reduced appetite for risk after the Fed signaled a slo...

item.title: Copper Falls After Fed Signals Rate-Cut Slowdown
item.description: Copper prices fell more than 1% after the Fed’s hawkish shift drove important commodity currencies sharply lower, Peak Trading Research said, adding “...

item.title: Treasury yields mixed after huge spike; Morgan Stanley says January Fed rate cut still possible
item.description: Bond yields put in a mixed performance in early trade on Thursday, after a big spike following the Fed’s more cautious outlook on rates.

item.title: Trump Isn't President Yet. He's Already Spooking the Fed.
item.description: Inflation risks from the incoming administration’s agenda can’t be ignored any longer.
